amendment.description: To provide for maritime transportation security.

action.text: Amendment SA 3905 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3905.
Amendment SA 3905 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S10215) To provide for maritime transportation security.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3905 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Lautenberg.
